pageContent: In a recent AUA/ACS scientific seminar, experts on prostate cancer met to present and discuss information concerning the detection and treatment of early-stage prostate cancer. This article provides an overview of the major topics covered, including perspectives on the problem, proposed clinical studies, diagnosis and prognostic factors, treatment studies, cancer control, and future directions.

metaData.source:
General quality of life 2 years following treatment for prostate cancer: what influences outcomes? Results from the prostate cancer outcomes study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12637483/
